resources.string:
Take turns* doing one or two of the following:
 - Play a card
 - Use a standard project
 - Use a blue card action
 - Spend 8 plants to place a greenery tile
 - Spend 8 heat to raise the temperature
 - Claim a milestone
 - Fund an award

Ocean:
 			Place only on the reserved areas.
 			Receive 1 Terraformer Rating.
 Greenery:
 			Place adjacent to a tile you own, if possible.
 						You do not own ocean tiles.
 			Increase oxygen 1 step.
 						Gain 1 TR if oxygen was raised.
 						Do not gain any TR if oxygen was already at max.
 City:
 			May not be placed next to another city tile.
 			Worth 1 VP for every adjacent greenery at the end of the game.
 Special:
 			Follow card instructions.

Increasing Oxygen, Temperature, and Ocean, also increases your TR.
 All cards have symbols that explain their function, and explanatory parenthetical text.
 If a card has an asterisk (*) it follows special rules listed on the card.
 A red border on a resource indicates that you may target any 1 player, including yourself.
 Production is marked by a resource icon in a brown box.

When Oxygen level is 14%, the temperature is at +8, and there are 9 ocean tiles in play, the game ends when the current generation has concluded.\n After the production phase is completed, players get an extra chance to, in turn order, spend plants to place greenery tiles, following the normal rules.

Your final score is the sum of the following:
 Terraformer Rating:
 Your TR as indicated by the TR track.
 Awards:
 Each funded award gives 5 VP to the winner of the category, and 2 VP to second place if there are at least 3 players.
 In a tie for first, both players score 5 VP, and no second place is awarded.
 In a tie for second, both players score 2 VP.
 Milestones:
 Score 5 VP for each milestone you claimed.
 Map:
 Score 1 VP for every greenery tile you own.
 Score 1 VP per adjacent greenery per city you own.
 Cards:
 Count up the VPs listed on all the cards you have played.
